titleStmt.title: To ANNE PROCTER, Anne Procter (1799-1888), daughter of Captain Thomas Skepper and Anne Dorothea (afterwards the third wife of Basil Montagu); married Bryan Waller Procter 1824; well known as the witty hostess of a wide literary circle. CD had known the couple since the late 1830s. 3 NOVEMBER 1865
titleStmt.bibl: Charles Dickens Letters Project, ed. Leon Litvack, Katie Brandt, Emily Bell, and Jeremy Parrott (London: Dickens Fellowship), DickensLetters.com.

sourceDesc.p: Text from facsimile in Bloomsbury Auctions online catalogue, March 2017

dateline.placeName: OFFICE OF ALL THE YEAR ROUND

body.p: I am delighted to book myself for Tuesday the 21st Novr at a quarter past 7
